Upserted.title: Maintenance Engineer(Car Parking System)
Upserted.jobAdvertisement:
About this Job



Job Highlight



  • Willing to work Stable Big Japanese based Company with good benefit.
  • Willing to have good career path and become Important Management Level in the company.
  • Experience working in Mechanical Engineer especially in Big Machinery Manufacturers.


 



Duties & Responsibility:



 



(Work Outling) :  Maintenance activities of mechanical parking device.      



Work closely with Thai Managers to help support Maintenance activities of mechanical parking device.



(Products) :  Parking System for High Building/Department Stores



  • Main duty is to support customer, do machines maintenance
  • Designing maintenance strategies, procedures and methods;
  • Carrying out routine scheduled maintenance work and responding to equipment faults;
  • Diagnosing breakdown problems;
  • Fitting new parts and making sure equipment is working correctly;
  • liaising with client departments, customers and other engineering and production colleagues;


 



Qualification:



Desired skills & experiences:



  (Must)



  • Thai Nationality Only, Male/Female (Male is preferable) Age:  26 – 30
  • Minimum 1 years experience in good background in machinery maintenance field
  • Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineer or any related field.
  • have good interpersonal skills and Driving License.


 (Preferable Qualification)



  •  Prefer the candidates that not changed JOB frequently.
  • Prefer the one who can speak English in Communication Level.


Languages skills:



  • ENGLISH    : Advance Conversation Level
  • JAPANESE  :  Advantage Point


 



Working Hour:                  8:30 – 17:30 (Flex Time)



 



About the Benefit



Salary:  20,000-30,000 THB/ Month     



- Annual Leave 14 days
- Bonus 2 times/year



- Medical Support



-Transportation Allowance



 



About the company



Corporate overview:



"Our Clients manufactures an enormous range of products. From a wide variety of plants, machinery and facilities that support industry and society, to simpler facilities closer to our daily lives, the company is continuing to broaden this product lineup in all areas of human activity, from the earth to outer space.”



Industrial & Product:      ‘Manufacturers



HOW TO APPLY

Upserted.title: Accounting Staff
Upserted.jobAdvertisement:
Job brief


We are looking for a reliable accounting manager to supervise, monitor and evaluate all day-to-day accounting activities. Accounting manager responsibilities include establishing financial status by developing and implementing systems for collecting, analyzing, verifying and reporting financial information.


Responsibilities


    Manage and oversee the daily operations of the accounting department

    Process month and end year process, accounts payable/receivable, cash receipts, general ledger, payroll and utilities, treasury, budgeting, cash forecasting, revenue and expenditure variance analysis, capital assets reconciliations, trust account statement reconciliations, check runs, fixed asset activity, debt activity etc

    Monitor and analyse accounting data and produce financial reports or statements

    Establish and enforce proper accounting methods, policies and principles

    Coordinate and complete annual audits

    Provide recommendations

    Improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective actions

    Assign projects and direct staff to ensure compliance and accuracy

    Meet financial accounting objectives

    Establish and maintain fiscal files and records to document transactions


Requirements


    Proven working experience as Accounting Manager

    Advanced computer skills on MS Office, accounting software and databases

    Ability to manipulate large amounts of data

    Proven knowledge of accounting principles, practices, standards, laws and regulations

    High attention to detail and accuracy

    Ability to direct and supervise

    BS degree in Accounting or Finance

Upserted.title: Administration Executive
Upserted.jobAdvertisement:
Job Description :

'Handling & preparing purchase order documentation from customer and SCS to be sent to the supplier. Assisting the business trip documentation from team member. Assist project team to manage the project documentation. Assist commercial team to support the tender documentation required. Handling & Preparing invoice documentation


Job Requirements :

Has experience as administration min 1 year


Preferable Requirements :

Experience in administration engineering project will be advantage


Remuneration :

Basic salary, meal and transportation allowance, yearly bonus


Interested parties please send your resume to Indonesia@rgf-hragent.asia


Added 1 line at the bottom on August 22.
